title: Event
description: This is the fucking awesome Event entity. It has incredible methods to help you retrieve events and more.

methods.name: List of events
methods.action: List all events ordered by date from past to future

params.name: lat
params.description: requires long (higher priority than the state*). If the both param (lat/long and state) is passed, the system ignore the state and use only lat/long.

params.name: long
params.description: requires lat (higher priority than the state*). If the both param (lat/long and state) is passed, the system ignore the state and use only lat/long.

params.name: to
params.description: A date limit to bring events. Great to set intervals like, a specific week, or month.

params.name: state
params.description: Great to bring events from a specific state. Accepts only Brazilian states.

params.name: term
params.description: Text to be used to search for tags, titles, description and link, encoded in URI format - see RFC - 3986.

examples.description: Brings all events who has term words in any context and are in São Paulo.
Brings all events until 400km from the given latitude and longitude.
Brings all events happening from 23 to 25 November in 2012.
Brings all events from today, but only id, title and venue information.

methods.name: Retrieve specific event
methods.action: Brings full set of specific information for the given id event.

examples.description: Brings full set of information for specified event.
Bring full set of information for specified event, but only id, title and venue information.

methods.name: Retrieve Ingresse list
methods.action: List of users in Ingresse list for specified event with default set of information in a random order.

examples.description: List users in Ingresse list for specified event.

methods.name: Retrieve tickets list
methods.action: List of tickets for specified event with full set of information.

examples.description: List of tickets for specified event with full set of information.

methods.name: Retrieve event's poster
methods.action: Retrieve event's poster from CDN. Posters are already compressed.

params.name: size
params.description: As the recommmended parameter to be used, this request a poster from a default size: small (70x90), normal(230x300), big(460,600).

params.name: width
params.description: Width in pixels. Requires height to be specified.

params.name: height
params.description: Height in pixels. Requires width to be specified.

examples.description: Brings event poster in default size.
Brings event poster in normal size.
